League 1
ASSE: under Puel, Bouanga reigns over Europe
Since the arrival of Claude Puel at the head of ASSE, Denis Bouanga seems to be completely fulfilled and his performances on the ground are felt.
06 Nov 2019, 20:46 by Antoine Chirat

Zaydou Youssouf Previous club: Girondins de BordeauxTransfer allowance: 2 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport

ASSE: all the recruits of the transfer window 2019




Arrived this summer in Forez from N√Æmes, Denis Bouanga quickly appeared as a player stuffed with quality, but sometimes tends to do too much, and especially to lack regularity. Critics who seem to be gradually fading since the arrival of a man: Claude Puel. Indeed, the Gabonese never stops to impress and was elected five times "man of the match" by the specialized site "WhoScored", including four under Puel. This is the best total for a player in the five major European leagues.
Statistics that prove the magnitude that is taking the player in the collective St√©phanois with a new coach at the helm. It also realizes more dribbling by games (4.3 against 1.5 before), more shots (3.3 against 2.6) ... to the delight of supporters of the Greens.
